prontera,223,209,4	script	Pet Master	993,{
set @name$, "[Pet Master]";
mes @name$;
mes "Its kinda hard to put it all togather and came here to sell all of it, soo many hazard and experiance to gain, but i manage.Here take a look";

switch(select("Armor:Tame:Eggs:Food"))	{

case 1:
callshop "Armor Item",1;
end;

case 2:
callshop "Tame Item",1;
end;

case 3:
callshop "Eggs Item",1;
end;

case 4:
callshop "Food Item",1;
end;
}
end;
}
